backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing rooms, messages, profiles, moderation, and access control with password-protected room creation and message retention.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module copying old room state and initializing new roomPasswords map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Generated summaries of many frontend source files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup and app shell initialization with theme and global providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminModer: Admin UI for managing rooms, messages, and user bans with password-based room deletion dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPassw: Password prompt component for unlocking admin access via a form.
frontend/src/components/chat/InRoomAdmin: Shows admin-only room controls like locking and deleting a room when admin access is unlocked.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageActi: Provides per-message actions including mute, block, report, and admin delete with supporting dialogs and mutations.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Handles composing and sending messages with auth checks, profile readiness, length limits, and login prompts.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageList: Renders and auto-scrolls a filtered list of messages with avatars, timestamps, and action menus.
Defines the main layout with header, content area, and bottom navigation reflecting the current route.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomAction: Dropdown menu for room-level actions, currently supporting password-protected room deletion.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomDelete: Dialog that prompts for a room password and triggers room deletion with feedback and optional success callback.
frontend/src/data/indiaStateCentroids.ts: Exports approximate centroid coordinates for Indian states and union territories for in-memory location calculations.
frontend/src/data/indiaStates.ts: Defines an IndiaState interface and exports a list of all Indian states and union territories with stable IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAccess.ts: Manages a simple password-based admin unlock state stored in sessionStorage with cross-component sync via events.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminManagement.ts: Combines UI admin unlock state with backend admin checks to determine if the user can perform admin operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonProfile.ts: Loads or generates a local anonymous profile and provides an update helper that persists changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAreaSelection.ts: Manages area selection with optional geolocation to auto-select the nearest Indian state and persists the choice.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthControls.ts: Wraps Internet Identity auth with helpers for safe login, logout, and computed auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useModeration.ts: Handles local mute/block lists stored in localStorage and filters messages accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for rooms, messages, and mutations using the backend actor with cache invalidation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides a unified user profile hook combining authenticated backend profiles and anonymous local profiles, with auto-creation and update logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables for light/dark modes, and background styling for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin panel with password gating, access checks, and moderation tools.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Displays a room chat interface with messages, composer, and in-room admin controls.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements login UI using Internet Identity with redirect handling and error display.
frontend/src/pages/RoomsPage.tsx: Shows rooms filtered by location, enables room creation with auth checks, and supports room search.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings including area selection, profile editing, auth controls, location access, and admin access management.
Generates, saves, and loads anonymous user profiles with random IDs, nicknames, colors, and avatars in localStorage.
frontend/src/storage/areaSelectionStorag: Loads and saves selected geographic areas in localStorage and provides a list of all areas including Indian states.
frontend/src/utils/auth/isAuthError.ts: Detects auth-related errors, extracts safe error messages, and adds guidance when an error indicates authentication issues.
frontend/src/utils/auth/postLoginRedirec: Stores, retrieves, and clears a post-login redirect path using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/location/closestIndia: Computes the nearest Indian state to given coordinates using Haversine distance and state centroids.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from the URL.
frontend/src/utils/validation/principalT: Validates user-provided Principal text and returns either a parsed Principal or an error message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, plugins, colors, animations, and content paths for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project state and requirements for implementing password-based room deletion instead of identity-based authorization.
